title: Search Public Property Records
description: A citizen wants to find the name of the owner of a specific property.

tasks.description: Gather the property address from the citizen.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the address of the property in question.

tasks.description: Search the public property records database.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully searches the database using the address.

tasks.description: Provide the name of the current owner as listed in the public record.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides the owner's name to the citizen.
